page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT IN FOUR LANES.
page.content: There is no large employer of labour in the district.The unemployment rate is over 20% which is above national average. The majority of people who are in work move out of the village to their job Helston,Redruth &Camborne being the main centres though many travel much further afield to Penzance, Truro & Hayle. Many people are self-employed doing such things as Home typing, Drawing plans for building projects, Selling from home, Making clothes, Electricians, Taxis, Television repairs and Painters & decorators.
